img_text: FGM Wednesday, September 5, 2018 Sun 11 MING ELAN OUR DAY By EMILY ANDREWS Memories.. Meghan with little Matilda THE Duchess of Sussex gave a seriously ill little girl a rose for her "mem- ory box" last night as she and Prince Harry honoured Britain's bravest children. Meghan, 37, gave seven- year-old spina bifida-suf- ferer Matilda Booth the flower at the WellChild awards in central London WellChild patron Harry 33, got Inspirational Child winner Matilda, of Sowerby Bridge, West Yorks, to "pinky promise" to "never stop smiling". He also let Ruby Joslin-Smith, seven, play with his tie. Tie-pull. . Ruby and Harry
